thread.title_full: Trump supporters threaten to BOYCOTT the Oscars | Daily Mail Online

author: Daily Mail Reporter
title: Trump supporters threaten to BOYCOTT the Oscars | Daily Mail Online
text: comments The Academy Awards is under attack from Trump supporters furious at the 'arrogant hypocrites' in Hollywood, who are threatening to boycott the glitzy display. The protest originates in a widely shared Facebook pos t from Arizona Republican women's group 'Tempe Republican Women,' which urges followers to vote with their remote controls and switch off the Oscars. 'It is important that we, the deplorables, show the likes of Meryl Streep, Jennifer Lawrence, Alec Baldwin, Cher ... that we, the backbone and decent people of America, are more united than the bitter, unhappy, angry, divisive people of the entertainment industry,' the February 13 post said. That boycott was also mirrored in an on-site protest in LA that saw a trio of young women getting into a brawl before being split up by police. BREAKING: Leftists attack Trump supporters rallying for boycott of #Oscars ceremony on the Hollywood boulevard in LA .
